events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated in days.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's report about late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a delivery support specialist to handle the customer's delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order has not arrived yet, and I'm here to assist you with the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking info you have so I can check the current status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was five days ago, and it hasn't moved since then.
We have contacted the carrier for an update and expedited your shipment. You should receive a new tracking update within 24 hours.
Thank you for the quick response and update. I appreciate your help and look forward to seeing the tracking progress.
The shipment status has been updated and the package is now in transit. We consider the delivery delay issue resolved.
We are following up to ensure you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory with the delivery.
Yes, I received the package today and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks again for your excellent support.
The case has been formally closed following confirmation of package receipt and customer satisfaction.
